title: Headshot Crew News Update - May 25, 2020
summary: Peter Hurley anchors the Headshot Crew News, covering safe outdoor shooting setups during the pandemic, weekly contest winners, upcoming CrewCast schedules, member spotlights, and gear recommendations including the Ring Video Doorbell 2.

steps.action: Setup outdoor shooting bays using PPE and long lenses to photograph clients safely during the pandemic.
Participate in the 'Headshot of the Week' contest with the current theme 'What's in your bag?'.
Enter the Portfolio Revamp Challenge for a chance to win a Canon printer.
Tune in to the weekly CrewCast schedule featuring contests, success tracks, and software updates.
Create a GIF of yourself wearing a mask for your email signature as a fun engagement tip.
Install security cameras to protect gear from theft, recommended due to a recent studio break-in.
Watch the featured tutorial video 'Locking in the Color' to learn about lifelike color adjustments.

key_takeaways: Photographers are adapting to the pandemic by creating safe outdoor shooting environments with telephoto lenses.
Multiple contests are ending on May 31st, including the Portfolio Revamp and Tether Tools giveaways.
The Ring Video Doorbell 2 is the 'Gear of the Week' for its utility in studio security and catching thieves.
Upcoming live streams will cover Capture One 20.1 updates and portrait critiques.
